replaceListTokens(String, Map<String, Integer>, String) - Method in class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util.TokenHandler
Replaces some tokens in a query string with tokens of format ${token-name} where token-name represents a list of values.
replaceSomeTokens(String, Map<String, String>) - Method in class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util.TokenHandler
Replaces some tokens in a query string with tokens of format ${token-name} with the given replacements, which may again be tokens (e.g.
replaceTokens(String, String) - Method in class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util.TokenHandler
Replaces a query string with tokens of format ${token-name} with the specified replacement string for all tokens.
replaceTokens(String, String, String...) - Method in class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util.TokenHandler
Replaces a query string with tokens of format ${token-name} with the specified replacement string for all tokens.
replaceTokensWithOrientToken(String) - Method in class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util.TokenHandler
Replaces a query string with tokens of format ${token-name} with the token format in OrientDB, which is of the form :token-name.
replaceTokensWithValues(String, Map<String, Object>) - Method in class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util.TokenHandler
Replaces a query string with tokens of format ${token-name} with the values from the passed in map, where the token-name must be the key in the map
RepoBootService - Interface in org.forgerock.openidm.repo
Common OpenIDM bootstrap repository interface Implementing services provide basic connectivity and access to bootstrapping configuration Every repository boot service must provide CRUD access to configuration, And provide built in query support for queryid query-all-ids
RepositoryService - Interface in org.forgerock.openidm.repo
Common OpenIDM repository interface This service should only be used in when a direct interface to the repository is absolutely necessary and making the same requests over the router is not an option.
RESOURCE_NAME - Static variable in class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.QueryConstants
System populated query input key.

T

TokenHandler - Class in org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util
 
TokenHandler() - Constructor for class org.forgerock.openidm.repo.util.TokenHandler
 

U

update(UpdateRequest) - Method in interface org.forgerock.openidm.repo.RepoBootService
Updates a resource in the repository

This implementation requires MVCC and hence enforces that clients state what revision they expect to be updating

If successful, this method updates metadata properties within the passed object, including: a new _rev value for the revised object's version

update(UpdateRequest) - Method in interface org.forgerock.openidm.repo.RepositoryService
Updates a resource in the repository

This implementation requires MVCC and hence enforces that clients state what revision they expect to be updating

If successful, this method updates metadata properties within the passed object, including: a new _rev value for the revised object's version
